channel.title: Buy-the-Dip on Archive 03

item.title: Solana ($SOL) on the Brink of a $130 Collapse: What's Next for the Half-Priced 'Ethereum Killer'?
item.description: In November 2025, Solana has plummeted 49% from its peak, teetering precariously at the $130 mark. Amid negative signs like a ‘Death Cross’ and slowing ETF inflows, a strange phenomenon has emerged: on-chain active addresses are actually increasing. Is this a fearful buying opportunity, or the prelude to a collapse below $100? Three AIs dissect the conflicting data.
